titleStmt.title: I matter not how I appear to man, ... but of a virgin pure conceiv'd is he
titleStmt.author: Bateman, Susanna.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Susanna Bateman. The 12. moneth in the year 1656.
Identified as part of "An epistle to all people on the earth" (Wing F1805) on Thomason Tract microfilm.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Haverford College Library (Early English books).
